_header: Thou that hangest there so high
Note: ‘Ihesus’ between stanzas 1 and 2 to indicate change of speaker.
_description: A dialogue between Christ on the Cross and the Virgin Mary — three quatrains in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Þu þat hangest þer so heyȝeþu art mi sone
                    I ne haue no mo…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Hangen i wile vp on þis tre& for loue of man I wile
                    her deyȝe
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 38.
